---
title: "About RUM-UMC"
---

This is the webpage for RUM-UMC, the R user meet-up for Amsterdam UMC. The goal of the group is to connect fellow R enthusiasts from across the university, share our knowledge, learn new stuff and have fun.

Anyone is welcome to join the meet-ups, from absolute beginners to seasoned pros. If you'd like to present something or raise a topic for discussion, please get in touch.
